export const ReviewList = ({ reviews }) => { return <>
  • Reviews
    • { reviews.dataArray.length == 0 &&

    Be the first to add a review!

    } { reviews.dataArray.length > 0 && reviews.map((review, index) =>

  • { review.rating }

    { review.name }

    { review.date }

    { review.comment }

    • ) }
; }
